text: The Digital Agency (, Dejitaru-ch≈ç) is an agency of the Japanese government established on September 1, 2021, with the goal of advancing digital transformation in Japan.https://www.japantimes.co.jp/news/2021/09/01/national/politics- diplomacy/digital-agency-launch-japan/ Its mission includes improving administrative efficiency, strengthening information security, and fostering digital inclusion. The agency operates under the slogan, "Government as a Startup. == References == ==Other websites== Category:Government agencies Category:Government of Japan
title: Digital Agency
